name: PHOTOGRAPHER (itch)
description:
short game that will update with regulary, or no :), its short, and this is simulator, you just walk, and take photo

you play as a photographer, first campaign will be in 1981, yeah, "first", because new update, new campaign

game is based on my engine (compass engine) and they can work in web

controls:click:walk, double click:take photo

the game is logical non ideal :)

season 2 coming soon

source code will be not free
